bannerMessage: Now you can see institute holiday list also in 'My Leaves' screen.
maintenanceMessage: KHEE Vidya app is currently undergoing maintenance for improvements. The app will be temporarily unavailable during this time. We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience.
message: * New UI Improvements * Holidays screen implemented * Dashboard UI Improvements * Minor bug fixes ** Note: If you are facing issue while updating, Please uninstall the app and Install again.
